tool_description: Real Phone Validation’s API allows users to identify disconnected and invalid numbers. The real-time API uses live telco data - pinging the phone switch - for up to the minute accuracy (no stale database look-ups). Allowing users to determine whether the numbers they are collecting are accurate and contactable. The service also identifies if the number is a landline or mobile, provides phone carrier, and CallerID information.
name: Real Phone Validation
title: Real Phone Validation

api_list.name: RPV Turbo
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://real-phone-validation-real-phone-validation-v1.p.rapidapi.com/https://api.realvalidation.com/rpvWebService/RealPhoneValidationTurbo.php?zip=33756&phone=72755555 55&token=1234ABCD-1234-ABCD-1234-123456ABCDEF"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "real-phone-validation-real-phone-validation-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
